items.headline: West Ham Olympic Stadium rent is £2.5m
items.summary: West Ham will pay £2.5m a year to rent the Olympic Stadium, it is revealed after the deal is made public.

items.headline: Agbonlahor out for two more weeks
items.summary: Aston Villa striker Gabriel Agbonlahor will be unavailable for two weeks as he undergoes a personal fitness programme.

items.headline: Referee Friend removed from Spurs game
items.summary: The Premier League removes Leicester-based referee Kevin Friend from Tottenham Hotspur's game at Stoke City on Monday.

items.headline: No action over Noble's Herrera carry
